items.sentence: We need money so that we can build a new building.

Tom was a colleague of mine before they fired him.

The melons they grow in this area taste very good.
How much money did you spend on clothes last year?

Even though he has a lot of money, he's not happy.
The workers' demands centered around overtime pay.
